name: Mr Twigs
description:
Mr. Twigs

>>> If you experience lag issues on the browser you can download the windows version!  <<<

Jane meets Mr. Twigs when she needs a friend the most, but seasons are changing. Can she help her friend through the hot summer days, or is the fate of a snowman written in stone?

Content Warning: the ideas explored in this game may evoke some sad emotions in the player.

This game was made in 3 days for Ludum Dare 50 

Controls

Tab - Sensitivity and Volume 

W A S D - Move

E - Interact

Programmers: João Pedro, Leo Ferraz
VFX Artist: Leo Ferraz
Game Designer: Gi Lazarini
2D Artist: Julia Melo

Music and SFX: Artlist.io

Free Assets:  UrbanFoxGamer, Gamerarena2014 (thanks :D )
